```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(-10, 10, 1000)
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, jvp(1, x, 0), label=r"$J_1$")
>>> ax.plot(x, jvp(1, x, 1), label=r"$J_1'$")
>>> ax.plot(x, jvp(1, x, 2), label=r"$J_1''$")
>>> ax.plot(x, jvp(1, x, 3), label=r"$J_1'''$")
>>> plt.legend()
>>> plt.show() 
```
